description: Frutalia is a family-owned business, specializing in transforming fruits into innovative products, particularly liquid fruit flavorings. Established in Boyac√° over 26 years ago, the company has grown to cover the national market, focusing on quality and sustainability. The company operates from an 1,800 square meter facility where it processes fresh fruit into concentrated fruit pulp, which is then packaged for distribution. With a commitment to local suppliers and renewable energy, Frutalia continues to evolve under the second generation, expanding its product portfolio and enhancing its operational efficiency.
name: Frutalia
